mapper.select: SELECT A.wm_order_id, B.`name` as wm_patriarch_name, C.title as pay_type_name, A.wm_patriarch_id, A.wm_order_type_id, A.out_trade_no, A.transaction_id, A.body, A.total_fee, A.spbill_create_ip, A.created_time FROM wm_order AS A INNER JOIN wm_patriarch AS B ON A.wm_patriarch_id = B.wm_patriarch_id INNER JOIN wm_order_type AS C ON A.wm_order_type_id = C.wm_order_type_id WHERE A.`status` = '1'
